metadata.name: On Some High
metadata.description:
I've had a vision for some time,  
A chromatic scope for arts, entwined  
Between lens and pigment, 
Water and mind.

Some paradoxical fission in my imagination,  
Finally, come to life, 
Through trial and frustration.  
Invisible, 
Intangible  
Until it clicked. 

Like most great discoveries in science,  
An accidental reaction. 
Where they seemingly randomly aligned:  
Watercolour and photo combined  
Perfectly. 
Joy and epiphany.

Now I'm running  
On some high.  
Try to catch me.

Media:  
Digital photo, captured in Kananaskis, Alberta, Canada.  
Abstract watercolour (physical).

Artist:  
Alex Mackenzie created all aspects of the final image, including the original photograph and watercolour.
